dev\/core4.0.md.Au final les pages du plugin doivent êtr: In the end, the plugin pages must be consistent with the pages of the core objects / scenarios / interactions (sizes, colors, layouts etc
dev\/core4.0.md.La sidebar n'a pas survécu à la v4: The sidebar did not survive v4
dev\/core4.0.md.Pour la remplacer, un menu contextuel es: To replace it, a context menu is available on the tabs for scenarios, objects, interactions, plugins

dev\/core4.0.md.Sur les pages de scénario, plugins etc,: On scenario pages, plugins etc, the 'Delete' button is passed to the right
dev\/core4.0.md.C'est le plus dangereux donc le plus loi: It is the most dangerous therefore the farthest
dev\/core4.0.md.La v4 et la nouvelle v3 ont un nettoyage: Both v4 and new v3 have automatic cleaning of files not present on your automatic plugin update
dev\/core4.0.md.Le core efface automatiquement les fichi: The core automatically deletes files older than 7 days that have not been updated

dev\/core4.0.md.Si vous souhaitez faire une modification: If you want to make a modification before cleaning you can use `pre_install
dev\/core4.0.md.Changement de nom github pour les accès: Change of github name for access to your private rests

dev\/core4.0.md.Nous le testons actuellement en interne: We are currently testing it internally and we will get back to you soon to suggest that you integrate your plugins into it

dev\/core4.1.md.Les fonctions `network->getInterfaceIp(): The functions `network-> getInterfaceIp (), network-> getInterfaceMac ()` and `network-> getInterfaces ()` have been replaced by `network-> getInterfacesInfo ()`

dev\/core4.1.md.La fonction `scenario->byString()` doit: The `scenario-> byString ()` function must now be called with the structure `[group] [object] [name]`
